0.speech: Many thanks... Say, would you like to perform one more task for me? I might be able to share something with you if you are successful, but I can't rightly say what it is unless you are successful.
0.1: This sounds interesting. What is your task?

1.speech:
You may have noticed in this cave layer that the plant life has started to grow visciously and desperately. Normally this sort of thing is self-limiting, but I fear that here it is being driven by some blasted creature with the ability to spur floral growth.
I want you to find it, and slay it. I will provide you with a tool to help you do this.
What do you say?
1.11: I will do this for you.
1.12: I don't think I am ready for this task.

2.speech: I appreciate it is hard to trust strangers but this is an important task, not some stupid trick. If you change your mind, I will be here.

11.speech: You are brave, descender. Spill yellow blood with this Withering Blade. Good luck.

12.speech: I agree, the task is daunting. If you reconsider, I will be here.
